lead_paragraph: Mikael Backlund scored two of Calgary's four goals in the second period and also had an assist, and the Flames beat the Colorado Avalanche 6-3 on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Backlund, Gaudreau Score 2 Goals Each as Flames Top Avs, 6-3
headline.main: Backlund, Gaudreau Score 2 Goals Each as Flames Top Avs, 6-3
